system.description:
You spin, and then unleash a rising kick, sending the target flying.

Spend 1 Beat to attack an adjacent fighter with Bravery and then juggle them.

Hornbill Combination: Spend 2 Beats to attack them again immediately afterwards with Bravery + Faith.

King Eagle Rends The Skysea: Spend 3 Beats to attack them again with Bravery + Faith. You can slam the target to the ground, ending Juggled, to add Overwhelming and Skewering to the attack, and then stun them. You become wide open until the end of your next riff afterwards.
system.flavor: This is a gentle strike, be not afraid to use it. With it, you shall sunder boulders. Death crumbles all things, even mountains.
